title: Looking for typeface identification
content:
Wanted to know if anyone knew of a good place to identify typefaces for free online, besides identifont.com?

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) "Racing" energetic script - hand lettered {Jonathan M}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135327/http:/typophile.com/node/19270 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Zahn Luxury Homes script logo - York Script {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135327/http:/typophile.com/node/19264 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hdovrhls

comments.content: This is the best place, really... :^)
